results.original_title: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ファントム ブラッド
results.overview: An adaptation of the original five volume arc of the popular JoJo's Bizarre Adventure manga, covering the Phantom Blood chapters. Jonathan Joestar is an aristocratic boy whose life is suddenly turned upside down by a mysterious new boy who arrives, Dio Brando. Dio has a connection to his father, and over time, a rivalry forms as Dio becomes obsessed with a mysterious, ancient, and mystical stone mask that Jonathan's father keeps.
results.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood

results.original_title: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ダイヤモンドは砕けない 第一章
results.overview: Morioh, 1999—a normally quiet and peaceful town has recently become a hotbed of strange activity. Jōtarō Kūjō, now a marine biologist, heads to the mysterious town to meet Jōsuke Higashikata. While the two may seem like strangers at first, Jōsuke is actually the illegitimate child of Jōtarō's grandfather, Joseph Joestar. When they meet, Jōtarō realizes that he may have more in common with Jōsuke than just a blood relation. Along with the mild-mannered Kōichi Hirose and the boisterous Okuyasu Nijimura, the group dedicates themselves to investigating recent disappearances and other suspicious occurrences within Morioh. Aided by the power of Stands, the four men will encounter danger at every street corner, as it is up to them to unravel the town's secrets, before another occurs.
results.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond is Unbreakable – Chapter 1

results.overview: Laaadies and Gentlemen, boys and girls ... it's time to get up and move with JOJO'S CIRCUS: TAKE A BOW! Join JoJo, a funny, curious clown, and her best friend, Goliath, in stories full of music, dance, imaginative movement, and engaging games and activities that encourage your child to get up and start moving. Your child will join JoJo in giggle-out-loud moves when JoJo's curiosity gets the best of her, and she learns a lesson about following instructions. Then, the Froginis teach JoJo and your child that it's okay to take a bow -- when you try your very best. It's a three-ring circus of fun as your preschooler explores with JoJo and learns musical and auditory skills, problem-solving, and physical movement. Whether it's being yourself or learning that you don't have to win to have fun, growing up happy is even easier when your child joins JoJo to "twist and turn, imagine and learn."
results.title: JoJo's Circus: Take a Bow!

results.overview: An honest story of an adult movie star performance.  Hear her story about the filming set and her daily life.
results.title: Jojo's sex partner

results.overview: JoJo's D.R.E.A.M. Tour has all been building to her homecoming show in Omaha, Nebraska. This hour-long special is packed full of live concert performances, surprises, heart, and all the magic of D.R.E.A.M. The Tour.
results.title: JoJo's D.R.E.A.M. Concert

results.overview: Laaadies and Gentlemen, boys and girls ... it's time to get up and move with JOJO'S CIRCUS: ANIMAL A GO-GO. Join JoJo, a funny, curious clown and her best friend, Goliath, in stories full of music, dance, imaginative movement, engaging games, and activities that encourage your child to get up and start moving. Child participiation is part of the fun in four lively stories. There are bouncy moves ahead when JoJo discovers that she's not quite ready to fill some pretty big shoes. But she's always ready to figure things out, including learning a silly slinky snake dance to help pick a flower for her dad. From using teamwork to helping Goliath learn, your child will discover valuable lessons about kindness, teamwork, and belonging.
results.title: JoJo's Circus: Animal a Go-Go

results.overview: When her best friend Jojo falls in love and moves on from their wild dating adventures in Berlin, Paula does everything she can to sabotage her wedding.
results.title: For Jojo

results.overview: In a bleak and desolate world, a small creature seeks out the woman of his dreams: a high-flying circus performer with a cruel and possessive ringmaster.
results.title: Jojo in the Stars

results.original_title: BJ: La vida y locuras de Bosco y Jojo
results.overview: It's the story of a hilarious journey of a pair of talented and multiple award-winning Art Director, Bosco & Jojo, from Argentina, venturing out to make their first feature film. Bosco & Jojo's, early success in the '90s, sees them founded the legendary infamous club, 'Kim Y Novak', frequented by the likes of Francis Ford Coppola and Rolling Stones, inspired song written about it by Benjamin Biolay in the 2000s. They went on to open an art gallery, POPA, showcasing controversial art collections. Especially for "Plastic Religion" by Pool & Marianela. Achieving headlines in The NY Times and Wire. The tribulation to producing their first feature film led them through a nostalgic journey when they had their first big break from making the film Happy Together, by the renowned Hong Kong Director, Wong Kar Wai. This journey takes them unpeeling layers of adventure and misadventure of their life.
results.title: BJ: The Life and Times of Bosco and Jojo

results.overview: Mrittika is assigned a bizarre task of babysitting an eerie-looking doll named Jojo. Will she be able to deal with it or will Jojo add yet another dark twist in her life?
results.title: Jojo

results.overview: Violet is new to JoJo’s school. She has a big nose, and lots of trouble making friends. Violet however, has a big big heart and, to be accepted by the others, she is ready to take chances which not everyone agrees with...especially not the school Principal!
results.title: Jojo - The Violet Mystery
